classes.subtitle: Intermediate Greek I.  3 Credits.

classes.subtitle: Introductory Greek New Testament.  3 Credits.

classes.title: GREK710
classes.subtitle: Greek Prose Composition.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Review of Attic grammar and idiom, exercises in composition, introduction to stylistics.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: GREK711
classes.subtitle: Readings in Early Greek Poetry.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Review of Attic grammar and idiom, exercises in composition, introduction to stylistics.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: GREK711
classes.subtitle: Readings in Early Greek Poetry.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Selections from Homer, Hesiod, and/or the lyric and elegiac poets of the Archaic period, focusing on works on the M.A. and Ph.D. reading lists.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: GREK712
classes.subtitle: Readings in Greek Literature of the Fifth Century.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Selections from Homer, Hesiod, and/or the lyric and elegiac poets of the Archaic period, focusing on works on the M.A. and Ph.D. reading lists.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: GREK712
classes.subtitle: Readings in Greek Literature of the Fifth Century.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Selections from tragedy, Old Comedy, and/or historiography, focusing on works on the M.A. and Ph.D. reading lists.Grading status: Letter grade.
